title: The Classic Picnic
contents:
Our signature European style picnic is ideal for those do-it yourself picnickers. Enjoy this classic picnic in your room, take it for a stroll or grab-and-go to your next meeting or departure.

2 Locally produced cheese, 2 Cured meats from Salumeria Biellese, 1 Fresh baked baguette, Marinated olives, Black Tea and fig jam, 2 Sea salt caramels from Liddabit Sweets, 2 Bottles of Spring water

 

For more additional information and to book you perfect picnic, please contact our Concierge at 212-707-4820 or email at concierge@westhousehotelnewyork.com
